price: وە لەو پەڕی شارەکەوە پیاوێك بەپەلە ھات ووتی ئەی گەلەکەم شوێن ئەم پێغەمبەرانە بکەون
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajāa min aqṣā al-madīnati rajulun yasʿā qāla yāqawmi ittabiʿū al-mur'salīna
